about_the_game:
Action based 3rd person horde mode style game. Use swords, Bows, and Bombs to clear each wave. After each night of clearing the town you can travel back to the local Inn where you can shop for upgraded weapons, restock on potions and food, and upgrade stats such as Health, Stamina, Melee Damage, Bow Damage, Movement speed, and unlock perks such as dodge rolling, Timed Blocks, And Slow Motion Aiming.

A strange curse has been cast apon the town of BlackWalk and its up to you to figure out how to stop it. Hack, Slash, and shoot your way to clearing the Town of BlackWalk of the Undead that curse it. Upgrade stats buy and sell Items and even blow stuff up in this wave based 3rd person action game with light Rpg mechanics. Difficulty and variety of enemy's change nightly. Clear the town nightly until confronted by the lych king himself and rid the town of its curse once in for all.

A Demo for Undead Village will be released shortly to gain feedback on currant gameplay and to engage with community about future additions to the game. Player feedback is important to me and I would love to hear from others in order to make an enjoyable experience for anyone interested in Undead Village.
Demo will feature the first 5 nights in the town of Blackwalk as well as the first boss Level.
